## Develop

In this section, you will find resources to develop the thinking needed for this chapter:

-   Skillpacks

-   Exercises - Level 1 (and full worked solutions)

### Skillpacks

Practice, practice, practice. It makes perfect, right? Skillpacks are infinitely repeating questions with a skill element. As such, they don't appear everywhere. Use these to practise necessary skills to be successful in A Level Maths.

### Exercises

In the develop section, you will find the Level 1 exercise and full worked solutions. These questions are designed to give you good foundations in the topic and develop your skills and understanding.
